::Grimmler::

Grimmler growls. He didn't like being ignored, especially by a pair of 
Predacons at the Cybertronian Fire. He walks up to Battera and Cybershark.

"I wouldn't want to interrupt anything," he says rudely, his gun ready, "But 
I'll repeat my earlier question," he looks at Cybershark, "Are you the 
Predacon that was supposed to be let in for peace talks?"
